summary: This bill directs the Secretary of the Air Force to incorporate depot-level maintenance coordination into multinational exercises within the United States Indo-Pacific Command's area of operations. It mandates the inclusion of considerations like binational planning, real-time coordination for munitions, mutual airworthiness recognition, and emergency exercises. The bill also requires a report to Congress detailing lessons learned from exercises with the Republic of Korea and Australia, including recommendations for partnerships and addressing potential logistical, intellectual property, and regulatory challenges.
